page.title: 12Domestic Pets
page.content: Cats have alert ears and eyes and are very independent,cats eat cat meat or biscuits.Fish live in water,you can either keep tropical or goldfish,they eat flakey bits of biscuit.Mice are kept in cages and eat sunflower seeds, wheat and apple.Hamsters live and eat very much the same as mice.Birds are also kept in cages and some breeds are known as Canaries,Parrots and Finches eat seed and worms.Ponies are kept in large areas outside and feed on hay grass and apples.Dogs are animals that bark and they live in kennels and sometimes indoors they eat dog food and bones.Tortoises are very slow at moving and hibernate in winter they eat vegetables.Rabbits eat the same as tortoises and live in a hutch.Gerbils and guinea pigs are kept very much the same as rabbits.
